tool_description: Shopee API is a powerful tool that enables developers to seamlessly integrate Shopee's e-commerce platform into their applications. With a range of features, it provides access to essential functionalities, ensuring a comprehensive shopping experience
name: Shopee Indonesia
title: Shopee Indonesia

api_list.name: Get Live Record ID

required_parameters.name: session_id
required_parameters.description: You can get session id from user share link

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shopee-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com/live/54663315/record"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopee-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shopee-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com/live/{session_id}/record"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopee-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Shop Live Reply List

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: You can get user_id / uid from shop detail endpoint
